Plugins (artview.plugins)Â¶

ARTview offer some function to start programs using basic configurations.

CalculateAttenuation([Vradar, name, parent]) Interface for executing pyart.correct.calculate_attenuation
AccessTerminal([name, parent]) Open an interactive python console so the direct manipulation
DealiasRegionBased([Vradar, name, parent]) Interface for executing pyart.correct.dealias_region_based
DealiasUnwrapPhase([Vradar, name, parent]) Interface for executing pyart.correct.dealias_unwrap_phase
GateFilter([Vradar, Vgatefilter, name, parent]) Interface for executing pyart.filters.GateFilter.
DirectoryList([dirIn, name, parent]) Open an interactive python console so the direct manipulation.
FileDetail([dirIn, name, parent]) Open an interactive button driven file advancement.
ManualFilter([Vradar, Vpoints, Vfield, ...]) Use of Points to remove data from Radar.
ManualUnfold([Vradar, Vpoints, name, parent]) Use of Points to Unfold Velocity in Radar
Mapper([Vradar, Vgrid, name, parent]) Interface for executing pyart.map.grid_from_radars
PhaseProcLp([Vradar, name, parent]) Interface for executing pyart.correct.phase_proc_lp
